work.name: HiWEB
work.summary: I am working on predicting customer behavior, such as the next purchase time, next package purchase, churn probability, and customer segmentation, based on purchase history. These predictions aim to provide business insights that increase customer loyalty and reduce churn rate using machine learning and deep learning algorithms.
highlights: Churn prediction, Customer behavior, Customer segmentation

work.name: YecomSoft
work.summary: I worked on developing a text-to-speech system for the Persian language and focused on Persian natural language processing.

work.summary: In this internship, I learned how to manage datasets and develop a website backend and its APIs.
